[vc_row type=”in_container” full_screen_row_position=”middle” column_margin=”default” column_direction=”default” column_direction_tablet=”default” column_direction_phone=”default” scene_position=”center” text_color=”dark” text_align=”left” row_border_radius=”none” row_border_radius_applies=”bg” overlay_strength=”0.3″ gradient_direction=”left_to_right” shape_divider_position=”bottom” bg_image_animation=”none”][vc_column column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_spacing=”default” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/1″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][nectar_btn size=”medium” open_new_tab=”true” button_style=”regular” button_color_2=”Accent-Color” icon_family=”none” text=”Reserve Your Spot” url=”https://www.eventbrite.com/e/ted-ings-presents-fixed-ops-roundtable-the-matrix-tickets-151883500639″][image_with_animation image_url=”7788″ animation=”Fade In” hover_animation=”none” alignment=”” img_link_target=”_blank” border_radius=”none” box_shadow=”none” image_loading=”default” max_width=”100%” max_width_mobile=”default” img_link=”https://www.eventbrite.com/e/ted-ings-presents-fixed-ops-roundtable-the-matrix-tickets-151883500639″][vc_column_text]

Join Ted Ings Presents, Fixed Ops Roundtable: The MATRIX

The Virtual Event: Thursday, June 17th, 2021 (9 AM – 6 PM EST)

Our very own, Owen Moon and Brad Paschal will be speaking and you do not want to miss it![/vc_column_text][nectar_btn size=”medium” open_new_tab=”true” button_style=”regular” button_color_2=”Accent-Color” icon_family=”none” text=”Reserve Your Spot” url=”https://www.eventbrite.com/e/ted-ings-presents-fixed-ops-roundtable-the-matrix-tickets-151883500639″][image_with_animation image_url=”7787″ animation=”Fade In” hover_animation=”none” alignment=”” img_link_target=”_blank” border_radius=”none” box_shadow=”none” image_loading=”default” max_width=”100%” max_width_mobile=”default” img_link=”https://www.eventbrite.com/e/ted-ings-presents-fixed-ops-roundtable-the-matrix-tickets-151883500639″][vc_column_text]Join us for an interactive roundtable among industry peers, featuring an in-depth discussion of fixed ops strategies!

No Refunds on tickets or sponsorships – Tickets may be transferred to someone else.

THE AGENDA – All Times Eastern (EST):

8:50 am – Countdown Clock

9:00 am – Opening Segment: Ted Ings, Gene Girdley, Kara Delaine, Joe St. John, Owen Moon, Tully Williams

9:20 am – LaMarque Ward – Charthouse Learning

9:37 am – Keynote: David Foutz – Cox Automotive

10:12 am – Zack Fox – BG Products

10:25 am – Brian Kramer – Germain Toyota of Naples

10:45 am – Lissette Gole – Google

11:09 am – Kevin Winter – Team Velocity

11:30 am – Break

11:37 am – Automotive News Panel – Tully Williams, Jim Roche, Sarah Vantine, Ed Roberts, Joe St. John, Dave Versical – Moderator

12:19 pm – Les Silver – Dynatron Software

12:38 pm – Quantum 5 – Special Announcement

12:43 pm Quantum 5 Panel – David O’Brien, Dave Foy, Jason Frank, Laurie Halter – Moderator

1:05 pm – Joe McCue – Pencilwrench

1:20 pm – Sean Reyes – RecallMasters

1:40 pm – Break

1:50 pm – Dave Boyle – Tire Profiles

2:06 pm – Technician Panel – Marco Zwanenburg, Ernie Steagall, Jay Goninen, Randy Brenckman – Moderator

2:37 pm – Randy Brenckman – Ask the Expert

3:05 pm – PartsEdge Panel – Chuck Hartlee, Kaylee Felio, James Holloway, Ed Roberts – Moderator

3:32 pm – Brandon Nixon – UpdatePromise

4:00 pm – John Traver – Traver Connect

4:22 pm – Break

4:27 pm – Marketing and Technology Panel – William Demaree, Shon Kingrey, Anne Lister, Brad Paschal, Owen Moon, Fixed Ops Digital – Moderator

5:00 pm – Cathy Palochko and Joey Zanca – Automotive Retail Academy (GP Strategies)

5:15 pm – Art Shaw – RepairPal

5:34 pm – Fred Fordin – CDK

5:50 pm – Busting Warranty Myths Panel – Tully Williams, William Demaree, Justin Pomeroy, Jim Roche, WarrCloud – Moderator

6:20 pm – Anthony Monteiro – DRAIVER

6:40 pm – Dale Pollak and Brian Benstock

7:10 pm – Best Practice Awards Voting[/vc_column_text][nectar_btn size=”medium” open_new_tab=”true” button_style=”regular” button_color_2=”Accent-Color” icon_family=”none” text=”Reserve Your Spot” url=”https://www.eventbrite.com/e/ted-ings-presents-fixed-ops-roundtable-the-matrix-tickets-151883500639″][/vc_column][/vc_row]

yoast_head_json.og_description: Don't miss Owen Moon and Brad Paschal who will be speaking. Thursday, June 17th from 9 AM - 6 PM EST. Reserve your complimentary tickets at fixedopsroundtable.com!

@graph.caption: Fixed Ops Roundtable: The Matrix Event

@graph.name: Fixed Ops Roundtable: The MATRIX - Fixed Ops Digital
Julie Branum
@graph.description: Julie has a decade of experience in the car business and marketing specifically for manufacturer dealerships in the U.S. Utilizing best practices and her background in design, Julie believes in presenting and converting dealerships online visitors into high RO Service and Parts Department customers.
